query: UPDATE tutor_profiles SET approvalStatus = 'approved' WHERE userId = (SELECT id FROM users WHERE email = 'arunemba@gmail.com' LIMIT 1); UPDATE users SET role = 'tutor' WHERE email = 'arunemba@gmail.com';
